Meet the hiring team
Jerome Ong 
3rd
Associate Manager - Talent Acquisition at HCL Tech
Job poster
Message
About the job
The Fresh Graduate Software Engineer will support key application services projects and HCL Technology Singapore has several entry level technical roles for new/recent graduates. The role requires a basic understanding of modern technical and cloud-native practices, AI and DevOps.

Responsibilities
Develop solutions leveraging GenAI technologies, integrating AI capabilities into cloud-native architectures.
Be involved in the development, coding, testing, deployment, and software maintenance of the applications and products.
Assist in the design and implementation of GenAI-driven applications, ensuring integration with microservices and container-based environments.
Operate IT production services according to management protocols and Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
Together with your team, support various phases of the Software Development Lifecycle, ensuring client satisfaction and delivery excellence.

Requirements
Graduate in Diploma and specialized in Information Technology/Computer Science/Engineering/Mathematics or relevant technical area of study.
Passion for software engineering in the emerging platforms or domains
Basic understanding of software development and exposure to AI/ML technologies.
Basic experience in designing and optimizing prompts for AI models to achieve desired outputs.
Relevant internship or academic project experience in Java/Python/AI/DevOps would be a plus
Strong analytical skills and problem-solving skills
Flexibility and willingness to work on different projects if required

HCLTech is a global technology company, home to more than 226,600 people across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around AI, digital, engineering, cloud and software, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, High Tech, Semiconductor, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, Mobility and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending September 2025 totaled $14.2 billion. To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit hcltech.com.
